us.radiri.merc.geo

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.radiri.merc.geo.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ellipse, Line, Point, Rectangle, Triangle

    public abstract class Shape
extends Object
    The abstraction of all shapes.
    Author:
    wessles

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected float h
      The absolute value of the difference of y and y2.
      protected float rot
      The rotation angle (in degrees, COS screw radians)
      protected Vec2[] vertices
      All vertices that make up the shape.
      protected float w
      The absolute value of the difference of x and x2.
      protected float x
      The x value of the vertex top-left-most vertex.
      protected float x2
      The x value of the vertex bottom-right-most vertex.
      protected float y
      The y value of the vertex top-left-most vertex.
      protected float y2
      The y value of the vertex bottom-right-most vertex.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape

        public Shape(float... coords)
        Parameters:
        coords - The coordinates of all vertices in the shape. Will be parsed for every 2 values into a Vec2.

      • Shape

        Parameters:
        vertices - All vertices in the shape.

    • Method Detail

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Shape s)
        Returns:
        Whether s intersects with this shape.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Shape s)
        Returns:
        Whether all vertices of s is inside of this shape.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Vec2 v)
        Returns:
        Whether v is inside of this shape.

      • translate

        public void translate(float x,
             float y)
        Moves all vertices by x and y.
        Parameters:
        x - The amount every vertex should move on x.
        y - The amount every vertex should move on y.

      • translateTo

        public void translateTo(float x,
               float y)
        Moves all vertices to x and y.
        Parameters:
        x - Where every vertex should move relative to 0 on x.
        y - Where every vertex should move relative to 0 on y.

      • translateTo

        public void translateTo(float x,
               float y,
               float origx,
               float origy)
        Moves all vertices to x and y relative to a origin.
        Parameters:
        x - Where every vertex should move relative to the origin on x.
        y - Where every vertex should move relative to the origin on y.
        origx - The origin's x.
        origy - The origin's y.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(float origx,
          float origy,
          float angle)
        Rotate the object relative to a origin.
        Parameters:
        origx - The origin's x.
        origy - The origin's y.
        angle - The angle by which the object will rotate relative to the origin.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(float angle)
        Rotate the object relative to the center of the object.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle of rotation.

      • rotateTo

        public void rotateTo(float origx,
            float origy,
            float angle)
        Rotate the object to a point in rotation relative to a origin.
        Parameters:
        origx - The origin's x.
        origy - The origin's y.
        angle - The angle by which the object will rotate to relative to the origin.

      • rotateTo

        public void rotateTo(float angle)
        Rotate the object to a point in rotation relative to the center of the object.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle of rotation that the object will rotate to.

        Returns:

      • getWidth

        public float getWidth()
        Returns:
        The difference between the nearest x and the farthest x.

      • getHeight

        public float getHeight()
        Returns:
        The difference between the nearest y and the farthest y.
